short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension identifies and collects all advertisements delivered to you while you surf the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Researchers at Deakin University are interested in understanding youth exposure to the advertising of unhealthy foods, alcohol, gambling, and e-cigarettes. This browser extension identifies and collects all advertisements delivered to you while you surf the internet, which will be used to inform this research.
